dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from Nicholas Whyte
dmca.body:
/// 30 Aug 06 12:38 International CrisisGroup 02 502 50 38 p.1 



Google, Inc. 
Attn: Blogger Legal Support, DMCA Complaints 
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway 
Mountain View, CA 94043 

+1(650) 618-2680, Attn: Blogger Legal Support, DMCA Complaints 

1. I am the author of most of the material at 
http://explorers.whyte.com/100books/nwgbooks.htm, "The 100 Greatest Books in History". While the actual list of book titles was compiled (as I state) by the Norwegian Book Clubs, all the rest of the commentary on the page is written by me and is therefore my copyright. 

2. This entire page has been copied, including all my formatting and links apart from font face, to 
http://greatest-books.blogspot.com/2006/08/100-greatest-books-in-history.html without my permission. You will see that I have posted a comment to the blog requesting the removal of the material; however it is still there. 

3. I can be contacted by post at 
Nicholas Whyte, 
Francis Crabbestraat 15a, 
Belgium 
or by email at nicholas.whyte@gmail.com 

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the 
copyright owner, its agent, or the law. I am the copyright owner; I have appoint no agent to act an my behalf in this matter; and the law, I think, is clear. 

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner. 

[signed]
